ROOT_t.en-US: This is a story of a charming little girl named Little Red Riding Hood, adored by everyone, especially her grandmother. Her grandmother gifted her a red velvet cap, which she wore all the time. One day, Little Red Riding Hood's mother asked her to bring a piece of cake and wine to her sick grandmother, and warned her to stay on the path and not break the glass bottle.

GOTO_PIAZZA_pt.en-US: She goes to the famous piazza of the village

GOTO_PIAZZA_t.en-US: The little girl decided to disobey her mother and to explore the piazza of the village before going to visit her grandmother.

GOTO_MARKET_pt.en-US: She goes to the market of the village

GOTO_MARKET_t.en-US: The little girl decided to disobey her mother and to explore the market of the village before going to visit her grandmother.

GOTO_WOODS_pt.en-US: She enters the woods to reach grandmother's house

GOTO_WOODS_t.en-US: The little girl decided to enter the woods.

VILLAGE_ENCOUNTER_FRIENDS_t.en-US: During her trip on the village, she met some of their friends. She decided to play with them a bit before going to visit her grandmother. One of them said that he saw in the woods a big scary wolf.

VILLAGE_ENCOUNTER_DAD_t.en-US: During her trip on the village, she was seen by her father, who ordered her to go to the grandmother's house before it gets dark.

VILLAGE_ENCOUNTER_HUNTSMAN_t.en-US: During her trip on the village, she met an huntsman that was hunting a dangerous wolf. The man said to the little girl to not go around alone when it gets dark.

GET_FRIEND_STICK_pt.en-US: Ask to borrow the friends's stick

GET_FRIEND_STICK_t.en-US: She asks his friend if she can borrow his sharp stick in order to defend herself if she encounters the scary wolf. he accepts and gives it to the little girl. Satisfied, the little girl decided to enter the woods.

GET_DAD_KNIFE_pt.en-US: Ask to borrow the dad's knife

GET_DAD_KNIFE_t.en-US: She asks his father if she can borrow his knife to cut his grandmother's cake. The dad accepts and gives his favourite one to the little girl. Satisfied, the little girl decided to enter the woods.

GET_HUNTSMAN_PISTOL_pt.en-US: Ask to borrow the huntsman's pistol

GET_HUNTSMAN_PISTOL_t.en-US: She asks the man if she can borrow his pistol in order to defend herself if she encounters the wolf. The man accepts and gives his favourite one to the little girl. Satisfied, the little girl decided to enter the woods.

WOLF_APPROACH_1_t.en-US: A little after entering the woods, a wolf came up to her. He gently greeted her and wished her a good day.

HURT_WOLF_STICK_pt.en-US: The little girl uses the stick

HURT_WOLF_STICK_t.en-US: She decided to attack him with the stick. The wolf ran away.

HURT_WOLF_KNIFE_pt.en-US: The little girl uses the knife

HURT_WOLF_KNIFE_t.en-US: She decided to attack him with the knife. The wolf ran away.

HURT_WOLF_PISTOL_pt.en-US: The little girl uses the pistol

HURT_WOLF_PISTOL_t.en-US: She decided to attack him with the pistol. The wolf ran away.

GOOD_GREET_pt.en-US: The little girl greet him back with a smile

GOOD_GREET_t.en-US: She decided to greet him back with a smile.

WOLF_SNEAK1_t.en-US: The wolf decided to follow the little girl in order to understand in which direction she was headed. When he understood where was the house she was visiting, he decided to sprint in order to arrive there before the little girl. The wolf arrived to the grandmother's house. After some time, the little girl also arrived there and, to her surprise, the door of the house was open.

WOLF1_Q1_t.en-US: The wolf asked her where was she going so early.

WOLF1_Q1_A2_pt.en-US: She decided to avoid answering the question

WOLF1_Q1_A2_t.en-US: She answered by telling him that she was going somewhere not far from there.

WOLF1_Q1_A1_pt.en-US: She decided to tell him where she was going

WOLF1_Q1_A1_t.en-US: She answered by telling him that she was going to give her sick grandmother cake and wine.

WOLF2_Q1_t.en-US: The wolf asked her about the location of her grandmother's residence.

WOLF2_Q1_A2_pt.en-US: She decided to avoid answering the question

WOLF2_Q1_A2_t.en-US: She answered by avoiding giving details of where the old woman lived.

WOLF2_Q1_A1_pt.en-US: She decided to tell him the location of her grandmother's residence

WOLF2_Q1_A1_t.en-US: She answered by telling him that she lives a good quarter hour from here in the woods, under the three large oak trees.

WOLF3_Q1_t.en-US: The wolf suggested her to take a look at the beautiful flowers blossoming in the woods and to spend time listening to the birds singing before going to her grandmother's house.

WOLF3_Q1_A1_pt.en-US: She decided to spend time listening to the birds before going to her grandmother's residence

WOLF3_Q1_A1_t.en-US: She followed the wolf's suggestion and spent some time listening to the birds singing and picking flowers for her grandmother.

WOLF_HOUSE1_t.en-US: The wolf arrived to the grandmother's house. After some time, the little girl also arrived there and, to her surprise, the door of the house was open.

ENTER_HOUSE_pt.en-US: The little girl entered the house

ENTER_HOUSE_t.en-US: She decided to enter the house despite her fear. She saw her grandmother lying there with her cap pulled down over her face and looking very strange. Little Red Riding Hood noticed that her grandmother looked strange, with her cap pulled down over her face. She commented on her big ears and big eyes, and her grandmother replied that they were better for hearing and seeing. She then noticed her big hands and a horribly big mouth, and her grandmother replied that they were better for grabbing and eating. Suddenly, the supposed grandmother revealed himself as a wolf and jumped out of bed, attacking and devouring Little Red Riding Hood.

LEAVE_HOUSE_pt.en-US: The little girl decided to not enter the house

LEAVE_HOUSE_t.en-US: She understood that something's off, so she decided to leave the house

WORLD_STAGE1_t.en-US: When she left the house, she saw an huntsman passing by. She was scared that the wolf had done something bad to her grandmother and wanted to seek for help.

HUNTSMAN1_pt.en-US: She explains to the huntsman the whole story

HUNTSMAN1_t.en-US: After she explained to the huntsman what happened, he understood what was going on and went inside the house. He found the wolf laying on the bed. He decided to kill him and to rescue the grandmother from the wolf's belly. Everyone was saved and they lived happily ever after.

GOTO_MOM_t.en-US: The little girl was too scared to do anything, so she decided to return to her mother in order to explain what happened. After some time, an huntsman killed a wolf in the grandmother's house, but there were no traces of her, meaning that the wolf ate the poor old woman.
